description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ra9f","text":"This protocol details methods for LRRK2-liposome binding experiments analyzed by co-sedimentation or confocal fluorescence microscopy, respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5p46q","text":"Prepare samples in Beckman microfuge tubes with   LRRK2 or RCKW,   PS liposomes in the absence or presence of   GMPPNP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"300","error_concentration":false,"guid":"2BD313201F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"37CEB3A01F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"3ED42FE01F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v91a","text":"Centrifuge samples at   ( ) for   in a Beckman Optima TLX ultracentrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"49000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"49DD5A101F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"100000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"501F86501F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"52CFB2301F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7s0jd","text":"Collect Supernatants and Pellets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eca9s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"452ir","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3vg2k","text":"Note: Pellets were resuspended with the same volume of protein buffer as the supernatant.","type":"align-left"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b9r19","text":"Analyze samples by SDS-PAGE and coomassie blue staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bb08e","text":"For PS liposome binding. Prepare samples in PCR tubes with   Rhod-PE labeled PS liposomes and different concentrations of LRRK2 as indicated in the main text.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"62EDD3401F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hlt2","text":"Immediately deposit  -  samples of step 6 on   glass bottom dishes and incubate at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5t3hn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9j51","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"7E611BA01F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"813F83701F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"85437F801F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":201,"value":"35"}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8B6923101F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"900D7DD01F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"5":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"73sv0","text":"Note: Drop some buffer in the dish to prevent samples from drying out due to evaporation during incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7db2d","text":"After incubation, capture the images with a spinning disk confocal (SDC) microscopy at   on a Nikon Ti-E inverted microscope using the Improvision UltraVIEW VoX system (Perkin-Elmer).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A3776E801F8811ED96691512976D4E83","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
